pokemon.name: sprigatito
pokemon.dex: Its fluffy fur is similar in composition to plants. This Pokémon frequently washes its face to keep it from drying out.

pokemon.name: floragato
pokemon.dex: _________ deftly wields the vine hidden beneath its long fur, slamming the hard flower bud against its opponents.

pokemon.name: meowscarada
pokemon.dex: This Pokémon uses the reflective fur lining in its cape to camouflage the stem of its flower, creating the illusion that the flower is floating.

pokemon.name: fuecoco
pokemon.dex: It lies on warm rocks and uses the heat absorbed by its square-shaped scales to create fire energy.

pokemon.name: crocalor
pokemon.dex: The combination of ________’s fire energy and overflowing vitality has caused an egg-shaped fireball to appear on the Pokémon’s head.

pokemon.name: skeledirge
pokemon.dex: __________’s gentle singing soothes the souls of all that hear it. It burns its enemies to a crisp with flames of over 5,400 degrees Fahrenheit.

pokemon.name: quaxly
pokemon.dex: Its strong legs let it easily swim around in even fast-flowing rivers. It likes to keep things tidy and is prone to overthinking things.

pokemon.name: quaxwell
pokemon.dex: These Pokémon constantly run through shallow waters to train their legs, then compete with each other to see which of them kicks most gracefully.

pokemon.name: quaquaval
pokemon.dex: Dancing in ways that evoke far-away places, this Pokémon mesmerizes all that see it. Flourishes of its decorative water feathers slice into its foes.

pokemon.name: lechonk
pokemon.dex: This Pokémon spurns all but the finest of foods. Its body gives off an herblike scent that bug Pokémon detest.

pokemon.name: oinkologne
pokemon.dex: It entrances female Pokémon with the sweet, alluring scent that wafts from all over its body.

pokemon.name: tarountula
pokemon.dex: The thread it secretes from its rear is as strong as wire. The secret behind the thread's strength is the topic of ongoing research.

pokemon.name: spidops
pokemon.dex: It clings to branches and ceilings using its threads and moves without a sound. It takes out its prey before the prey even notices it.

pokemon.name: nymble
pokemon.dex: It has its third set of legs folded up. When it’s in a tough spot, this Pokémon jumps over 30 feet using the strength of its legs.

pokemon.name: lokix
pokemon.dex: When it decides to fight all out, it stands on its previously folded legs to enter Showdown Mode. It neutralizes its enemies in short order.

pokemon.name: pawmi
pokemon.dex: The pads of its paws are electricity-discharging organs. _____ fires electricity from its forepaws while standing unsteadily on its hind legs.

pokemon.name: pawmo
pokemon.dex: When its group is attacked, _____ is the first to leap into battle, defeating enemies with a fighting technique that utilizes electric shocks.

pokemon.name: pawmot
pokemon.dex: This Pokémon normally is slow to react, but once it enters battle, it will strike down its enemies with lightning-fast movements.

pokemon.name: tandemaus
pokemon.dex: The pair sticks together no matter what. They split any food they find exactly in half and then eat it together.

pokemon.name: maushold
pokemon.dex: They build huge nests with many rooms that are used for different purposes, such as eating and sleeping.

pokemon.name: fidough
pokemon.dex: The yeast in _______'s breath is useful for cooking, so this Pokémon has been protected by people since long ago.

pokemon.name: dachsbun
pokemon.dex: The surface of this Pokémon's skin hardens when exposed to intense heat, and its body has an appetizing aroma.

pokemon.name: smoliv
pokemon.dex: It protects itself from enemies by emitting oil from the fruit on its head. This oil is bitter and astringent enough to make someone flinch.

pokemon.name: dolliv
pokemon.dex: ______ shares its tasty, fresh-scented oil with others. This species has coexisted with humans since times long gone.

pokemon.name: arboliva
pokemon.dex: This Pokémon drives back enemies by launching its rich, aromatic oil at them with enough force to smash a boulder.

pokemon.name: squawkabilly
pokemon.dex: These Pokémon prefer to live in cities. They form flocks based on the color of their feathers, and they fight over territory.

pokemon.name: nacli
pokemon.dex: It was born in a layer of rock salt deep under the earth. This species was particularly treasured in the old days, as they would share precious salt.

pokemon.name: naclstack
pokemon.dex: It compresses rock salt inside its body and shoots out hardened salt pellets with enough force to perforate an iron sheet.

pokemon.name: garganacl
pokemon.dex: Many Pokémon gather around _________, hoping to lick at its mineral-rich salt.

pokemon.name: charcadet
pokemon.dex: Its firepower increases when it fights, reaching over 1,800 degrees Fahrenheit. It likes berries that are rich in fat.

pokemon.name: armarouge
pokemon.dex: This Pokémon clads itself in armor that has been fortified by psychic and fire energy, and it shoots blazing fireballs.

pokemon.name: ceruledge
pokemon.dex: The fiery blades on its arms burn fiercely with the lingering resentment of a sword wielder who fell before accomplishing their goal.

pokemon.name: tadbulb
pokemon.dex: _______ shakes its tail to generate electricity. If it senses danger, it will make its head blink on and off to alert its allies.

pokemon.name: bellibolt
pokemon.dex: When this Pokémon expands and contracts its wobbly body, the belly-button dynamo in its stomach produces a huge amount of electricity.

pokemon.name: wattrel
pokemon.dex: These Pokémon make their nests on coastal cliffs. The nests have a strange, crackling texture, and they're a popular delicacy.

pokemon.name: kilowattrel
pokemon.dex: It uses its throat sac to store electricity generated by its wings. There's hardly any oil in its feathers, so it is a poor swimmer.

pokemon.name: maschiff
pokemon.dex: Its well-developed jaw and fangs are strong enough to crunch through boulders, and its thick fat makes for an excellent defense.

pokemon.name: mabosstiff
pokemon.dex: __________ loves playing with children. Though usually gentle, it takes on an intimidating look when protecting its family.

pokemon.name: shroodle
pokemon.dex: To keep enemies away from its territory, it paints markings around its nest using a poisonous liquid that has an acrid odor.

pokemon.name: grafaiai
pokemon.dex: Each ________ paints its own individual pattern, and it will paint that same pattern over and over again throughout its life.

pokemon.name: bramblin
pokemon.dex: A soul unable to move on to the afterlife was blown around by the wind until it got tangled up with dried grass and became a Pokémon.

pokemon.name: brambleghast
pokemon.dex: It will open the branches of its head to envelop its prey. Once it absorbs all the life energy it needs, it expels the prey and discards it.

pokemon.name: toedscool
pokemon.dex: _________ lives in muggy forests. The flaps that fall from its body are chewy and very delicious.

pokemon.name: toedscruel
pokemon.dex: These Pokémon gather into groups and form colonies deep within forests. They absolutely hate it when strangers approach.

pokemon.name: klawf
pokemon.dex: This Pokémon lives on sheer cliffs. It sidesteps opponents' attacks, then lunges for their weak spots with its claws.

pokemon.name: capsakid
pokemon.dex: The more sunlight this Pokémon bathes in, the more spicy chemicals are produced by its body, and thus the spicier its moves become.

pokemon.name: scovillain
pokemon.dex: The red head converts spicy chemicals into fire energy and blasts the surrounding area with a super spicy stream of flame.

pokemon.name: rellor
pokemon.dex: It rolls its mud ball around while the energy it needs for evolution matures. Eventually the time comes for it to evolve.

pokemon.name: rabsca
pokemon.dex: The body that supports the ball barely moves. Therefore, it is thought that the true body of this Pokémon is actually inside the ball.

pokemon.name: flittle
pokemon.dex: It spends its time running around wastelands. If anyone steals its beloved berries, it will chase them down and exact its revenge.

pokemon.name: espathra
pokemon.dex: It emits psychic power from the gaps between its multicolored frills and sprints at speeds greater than 120 mph.

pokemon.name: tinkatink
pokemon.dex: It swings its handmade hammer around to protect itself, but the hammer is often stolen by Pokémon that eat metal.

pokemon.name: tinkatuff
pokemon.dex: These Pokémon make their homes in piles of scrap metal. They test the strength of each other's hammers by smashing them together.

pokemon.name: tinkaton
pokemon.dex: This intelligent Pokémon has a very daring disposition. It knocks rocks into the sky with its hammer, aiming for flying Corviknight.

pokemon.name: wiglett
pokemon.dex: This Pokémon can pick up the scent of a Veluza just over 65 feet away and will hide itself in the sand.

pokemon.name: wugtrio
pokemon.dex: It has a vicious temperament, contrary to what its appearance may suggest. It wraps its long bodies around prey, then drags the prey into its den.

pokemon.name: bombirdier
pokemon.dex: It gathers things up in an apron made from shed feathers added to the Pokémon’s chest feathers, then drops those things from high places for fun.

pokemon.name: finizen
pokemon.dex: It likes playing with others of its kind using the water ring on its tail. It uses ultrasonic waves to sense the emotions of other living creatures.

pokemon.name: palafin
pokemon.dex: This hero of the ocean swims at a speed of 50 knots and saves drowning people and Pokémon.

pokemon.name: varoom
pokemon.dex: It is said that this Pokémon was born when an unknown poison Pokémon entered and inspirited an engine left at a scrap-processing factory.

pokemon.name: revavroom
pokemon.dex: It creates a gas out of poison and minerals from rocks. It then detonates the gas in its cylinders—now numbering eight—to generate energy.

pokemon.name: cyclizar
pokemon.dex: It can sprint at over 70 mph while carrying a human. The rider's body heat warms ________'s back and lifts the Pokémon's spirit.

pokemon.name: orthworm
pokemon.dex: This Pokémon lives in arid deserts. It maintains its metal body by consuming iron from the soil.

pokemon.name: glimmet
pokemon.dex: It absorbs nutrients from cave walls. The petals it wears are made of crystallized poison.

pokemon.name: glimmora
pokemon.dex: When this Pokémon detects danger, it will open up its crystalline petals and fire beams from its conical body.

pokemon.name: greavard
pokemon.dex: This friendly Pokémon doesn't like being alone. Pay it even the slightest bit of attention, and it will follow you forever.

pokemon.name: houndstone
pokemon.dex: A lovingly mourned Pokémon was reborn as __________. It doesn't like anyone touching the protuberance atop its head.

pokemon.name: flamigo
pokemon.dex: This Pokémon apparently ties the base of its neck into a knot so that energy stored in its belly does not escape from its beak.

pokemon.name: cetoddle
pokemon.dex: It lives in frigid regions in pods of five or so individuals. It loves the minerals found in snow and ice.

pokemon.name: cetitan
pokemon.dex: This Pokémon wanders around snowy, icy areas. It protects its body with powerful muscles and a thick layer of fat under its skin.

pokemon.name: veluza
pokemon.dex: ______ has excellent regenerative capabilities. It sheds spare flesh from its body to boost its agility, then charges at its prey.

pokemon.name: dondozo
pokemon.dex: This Pokémon is a glutton, but it's bad at getting food. It teams up with a Tatsugiri to catch prey.

pokemon.name: tatsugiri
pokemon.dex: _________ is an extremely cunning Pokémon. It feigns weakness to lure in prey, then orders its partner to attack.

pokemon.name: annihilape
pokemon.dex: When its anger rose beyond a critical point, this Pokémon gained power that is unfettered by the limits of its physical body.

pokemon.name: clodsire
pokemon.dex: It lives at the bottom of ponds and swamps. It will carry Wooper on its back and ferry them across water from one shore to the other.

pokemon.name: farigiraf
pokemon.dex: The hardened head from the tail protects the head of the main body as _________ whips its long neck around to headbutt enemies.

pokemon.name: dudunsparce
pokemon.dex: It drives enemies out of its nest by sucking in enough air to fill its long, narrow lungs, then releasing the air in an intense blast.

pokemon.name: kingambit
pokemon.dex: Though it commands a massive army in battle, it's not skilled at devising complex strategies. It just uses brute strength to keep pushing.

pokemon.name: great-tusk
pokemon.dex: Sightings of this Pokémon have occurred in recent years. The name __________ was taken from a creature listed in a certain book.

pokemon.name: scream-tail
pokemon.dex: There has been only one reported sighting of this Pokémon. It resembles a mysterious creature depicted in an old expedition journal.

pokemon.name: brute-bonnet
pokemon.dex: It is possible that the creature listed as ____________ in a certain book could actually be this Pokémon.

pokemon.name: flutter-mane
pokemon.dex: This Pokémon has characteristics similar to those of ____________, a creature mentioned in a certain book.

pokemon.name: slither-wing
pokemon.dex: This mysterious Pokémon has some similarities to a creature that an old book introduced as ____________.

pokemon.name: sandy-shocks
pokemon.dex: No records exist of this Pokémon being caught. Data is lacking, but the Pokémon’s traits match up with a creature shown in an expedition journal.

pokemon.name: iron-treads
pokemon.dex: Sightings of this Pokémon have occurred in recent years. It resembles a mysterious object described in an old expedition journal.

pokemon.name: iron-bundle
pokemon.dex: It resembles a mysterious object mentioned in an old book. There are only two reported sightings of this Pokémon.

pokemon.name: iron-hands
pokemon.dex: This Pokémon shares many similarities with __________, an object mentioned in a certain expedition journal.

pokemon.name: iron-jugulis
pokemon.dex: It's possible that ____________, an object described in an old book, may actually be this Pokémon.

pokemon.name: iron-moth
pokemon.dex: No records exist of this species being caught. Data is lacking, but the Pokémon's traits match up with an object described in an old book.

pokemon.name: iron-thorns
pokemon.dex: Some of its notable features match those of an object named within a certain expedition journal as ___________.

pokemon.name: frigibax
pokemon.dex: This Pokémon lives in forests and craggy areas. Using the power of its dorsal fin, it cools the inside of its nest like a refrigerator.

pokemon.name: arctibax
pokemon.dex: ________ freezes the air around it, protecting its face with an ice mask and turning its dorsal fin into a blade of ice.

pokemon.name: baxcalibur
pokemon.dex: This Pokémon blasts cryogenic air out from its mouth. This air can instantly freeze even liquid-hot lava.

pokemon.name: gimmighoul
pokemon.dex: It lives inside an old treasure chest. Sometimes it gets left in shop corners since no one realizes it’s actually a Pokémon.

pokemon.name: gholdengo
pokemon.dex: Its body seems to be made up of 1,000 coins. This Pokémon gets along well with others and is quick to make friends with anybody.

pokemon.name: wo-chien
pokemon.dex: It drains the life-force from vegetation, causing nearby forests to instantly wither and fields to turn barren.

pokemon.name: chien-po
pokemon.dex: This Pokémon can control 100 tons of fallen snow. It plays around innocently by leaping in and out of avalanches it has caused.

pokemon.name: ting-lu
pokemon.dex: It slowly brings its exceedingly heavy head down upon the ground, splitting the earth open with huge fissures that run over 160 feet deep.

pokemon.name: chi-yu
pokemon.dex: It controls flames burning at over 5,400 degrees Fahrenheit. It casually swims through the sea of lava it creates by melting rock and sand.

pokemon.name: roaring-moon
pokemon.dex: It is possible that this is the creature listed as ____________ in an expedition journal that still holds many mysteries.

pokemon.name: iron-valiant
pokemon.dex: It's possible that this is the object listed as ____________ in a certain expedition journal.

pokemon.name: koraidon
pokemon.dex: This Pokémon resembles Cyclizar, but it is far burlier and more ferocious. Nothing is known about its ecology or other features.

pokemon.name: miraidon
pokemon.dex: Much remains unknown about this creature. It resembles Cyclizar, but it is far more ruthless and powerful.

pokemon.name: walking-wake
pokemon.dex: This ferocious creature is shrouded in mystery. It's named after an aquatic monster mentioned in an old expedition journal.

pokemon.name: iron-leaves
pokemon.dex: According to the few eyewitness accounts that exist, it used its shining blades to julienne large trees and boulders.

pokemon.name: dipplin
pokemon.dex: The head sticking out belongs to the fore-wyrm, while the tail belongs to the core-wyrm. The two share one apple and help each other out.

pokemon.name: poltchageist
pokemon.dex: It sprinkles some of its powdery body onto food and drains the life-force from those who so much as lick it.

pokemon.name: sinistcha
pokemon.dex: It pretends to be tea, trying to fool people into drinking it so it can drain their life-force. Its ruse is generally unsuccessful.

pokemon.name: okidogi
pokemon.dex: _______ is a ruffian with a short temper. It can pulverize anything by swinging around the chain on its neck.

pokemon.name: munkidori
pokemon.dex: _________ keeps itself somewhere safe while it toys with its foes, using psychokinesis to induce intense dizziness.

pokemon.name: fezandipiti
pokemon.dex: ___________ beats its glossy wings to scatter pheromones that captivate people and Pokémon.

pokemon.name: ogerpon
pokemon.dex: This Pokémon's type changes based on which mask it's wearing. It confounds its enemies with nimble movements and kicks.

pokemon.name: archaludon
pokemon.dex: It digs holes on mountains, searching for food. It’s so durable that being caught in a cave-in won’t faze it.

pokemon.name: hydrapple
pokemon.dex: Seven syrpents live inside an apple made of syrup. The syrpent in the center is the commander.

pokemon.name: gouging-fire
pokemon.dex: There are scant few reports of this creature being sighted. One short video shows it rampaging and spouting pillars of flame.

pokemon.name: raging-bolt
pokemon.dex: It's said to incinerate everything around it with lightning launched from its fur. Very little is known about this creature.

pokemon.name: iron-boulder
pokemon.dex: It was named after a mysterious object recorded in an old book. Its body seems to be metallic.

pokemon.name: iron-crown
pokemon.dex: There was supposedly an incident in which it launched shining blades to cut everything around it to pieces. Little else is known about it.

pokemon.name: terapagos
pokemon.dex: It’s thought that this Pokémon lived in ancient Paldea until it got caught in seismic shifts and went extinct.

pokemon.name: pecharunt
pokemon.dex: Its peach-shaped shell serves as storage for a potent poison. It makes poisonous mochi and serves them to people and Pokémon.
